players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Be careful, as I will continue to eliminate anyone I suspect of being a detective."
Bob: "I am a villager and I will work to uncover the mafioso. Please be cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
